title: Giving a low queue priority
body: I was in the champion select, then I somehow got kicked out . The next day, I went back into the game. When I clicked 'Find Match' it says that I've been put in a low queue. I didn't even do anything and this thing happened.

replies.body:
It might not be an LPQ, but rather a "one-time wait" as a result of leaving/DCing during champion select, so in that case it will only last for one match.

You can find more info on "Queue Dodging" in the FAQ on the Support site: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844
As well as more info on Leavebuster and LPQs: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714
